radiographic_examinations.findings: Numerous pelvic masses with severe colitis, bilateral moderate hydronephrosis, and metastatic disease in the liver.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: repeat staging CT chest, abdomen, and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Large rectal mass with peritoneal carcinomatosis and liver metastatic disease, extensive lymphadenopathy, and a sclerotic bone lesion in the right iliac.
